name: Helios Quantum Computing
founding_story_summary: Founded from MIT and Tsinghua University researchers focusing on scalable quantum processors and hybrid classical-quantum algorithms to accelerate scientific breakthroughs.
mission_statement: To build practical quantum computing platforms delivering unprecedented computational power to solve grand challenges in industry and science.
primary_products: HQC Quantum Processor; QuantaOS Hybrid OS; Quantum Sim Suite
primary_services: Quantum hardware design; quantum software platforms; consulting and hybrid algorithm development
core_ip_assets: Superconducting qubit architecture; error correction codes; hybrid algorithm suites
subsidiaries: HQC Europe GmbH (Munich); HQC Asia Pte Ltd (Singapore)
banking_partners: Cambridge Trust Bank; Bank of Asia
major_customers: National Labs; PharmaGen; AeroSpace Tech; Helix Data
major_suppliers: Intel Quantum; IBM Q; Cobalt CyberGuard (C004) for quantum-safe security
go_to_market_strategy: Direct R&D collaborations; government contracts; enterprise quantum cloud offerings
pricing_model: Subscription plus usage for cloud access; device leasing; consulting retainer models
primary_cloud_provider: AWS Quantum Cloud region + local HPC centers
data_stack: Snowflake; Apache Kafka for telemetry; customized quantum transpilers
environmental_goals: Net-zero carbon footprint by 2030; 70% renewable energy usage by 2026; sustainable chip fabrication
diversity_goals: 40% female leadership by 2030; STEM education partnerships; inclusive hiring
esg_policy_summary: Focus on responsible quantum tech development, sustainability, talent diversity, and transparent community engagement.
risk_register_top3: 1. Quantum hardware yield and scaling risks; 2. Regulatory export controls; 3. Talent retention challenges
competitors: IBM Quantum; Google Quantum AI; IonQ; Rigetti Computing
regulators: NIST; DOE; EU Quantum Flagship; US BIS; FTC
transfer_pricing_method: Transactional Net Margin Method with regional benchmarking
cash_management_policy: Maintain 10 months of liquidity; 60% cash in US Treasuries; vendor credit exposure management
treasury_risk_limits: Daily VaR $1.8M; max single supplier exposure $6M; FX hedge Â±$0.4M
board_committees: Audit; Science & Technology; Compensation; ESG; Nominating
